meanings.sent1: The cobaltine sky was a beautiful shade of blue.
meanings.sent2: The artist used cobaltine paint to create a stunning masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The cobaltine cupcakes looked almost too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like cobaltine jewels in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The cobaltine flowers in the garden added a touch of elegance.

meanings.sent1: She painted her room in a calming cobaltine color.
meanings.sent2: The cobaltine of the ocean was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent3: The cobaltine of his shirt matched the sky perfectly.
meanings.sent4: The cobaltine of the flag symbolized freedom and peace.
meanings.sent5: The cobaltine in the painting brought a sense of tranquility.
